title: Challenges and prospects: graphene oxide-based materials for water remediation including metal ions and organic pollutants
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, 11,3693-3720
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00143E, Critical Review
Muhammad Zubair, M. S. Roopesh, Aman Ullah
The remediation of polluted water via graphene oxide or derived materials has captivated the momentous attention of the scientific community over the past few years.
